thread.title: Mr Simon Stone
thread.title_full: Regtransfers.co.uk reviewed by Mr Simon Stone

author: Mr Simon Stone
title: Mr Simon Stone
text: I've bought 5 numbers from Regtransfers.co.uk over the years, and each time it's been really easy. The paperwork arrives really quickly, the process is clear (well as clear as DVLA will make it!) and the price for actual plates is hard to beat and you get them delivered to your door. Would be good to get a fixing kit as well though to save that extra trip to Halfords (other car accessory shops are available).
